Package angryflappybird

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
angryflappybird.Sprite
public class Sprite extends Object
The Sprite class represents a game object with an image that can be rendered on a graphics context. It also has position, velocity and size coefficients, as well as methods for updating and checking for collisions
Author:
Robin Tran, Jennifer Pham
